issue.title: [CF 1096] Bodyguard check
issue.body:
Any way to check if you are missing your barracks bodyguard (follower trait)? It does not seem to provide any trackable buff that I could find and I know they are a little unusual in how they behave. But if I let mine die, I so often can forget to re-summon them for a day or two.

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1096 | Raw

comments.body:
No, there is no way to determine this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just FYI for others, but not news to you since you added the buff to the add on thankfully, what I ended up doing was just checking for the Bodyguard Miniaturization Device (122298) buff. Not exactly accurate, but assuming someone always keep this buff active like I do, I've found it works quite well until blizz makes a change for bodyguards. Cheers!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979
